personal.bio: I am a CS student with the fever to explore all possible sub-domains of Computer Science. My aim isn't (for now) to deprive myself by limiting to one or two specific fields but keep on venturing until i am confident/mature enough to settle down. So far I have successfully ticked off Cloud Computing, Networking, Web Development, Version Control, Project Management, Prompt Engineering, AI with lots more to come.

projects.title: PollPulse
projects.description:
PollPulse ‚Äî a real-time voting platform on AWS.

I built this as my Cloud Computing capstone project to explore how to architect a secure, scalable voting system.Configured a custom VPC where the EC2 web server sits in a public subnet, while the RDS MySQL database is tucked away in a private subnet for maximum security.

content.text: I am a Certified Data Scientist trained in fundamentals which include data visualization, statistical analysis, data scrubbing and model training. These valuable skills vastly improved my technical ability. I plan to expand my hold on Cloud Computing as well as potentially Web Development.
